name: All Pro Appliance Repair
overview:
All Pro Appliance Repair is a home repair appliance company servicing all makes and models of kitchen and laundry room appliances. Washer, Dryers, Front Load, Top Load Washer and Dryers. Refrigerators, Ovens, Stoves, Ranges, Dishwashers, Garbage Disposal, Microwaves. Allen, TX and Collin and Dallas, TX counties. Allen, Sachse, Richardson, McKinney, Addison, N. Dallas, Frisco, Plano, Rockwall, Rowlett, Texas areas serviced.

Whirlpool, GE, Bosch, Sears, Kenmore, LG, Fisher-Paykel, Admiral, Amana, Frigidaire, HotPoint, Jenn-Air, Kitchen Aid, Magic Chef, Norge, Roper, Samsung, Scotsman, Sub-Zero, Tappan, Thermador, Uline, Viking and many more manufacturers serviced.

Member of Better Business Bureau. www.allprotvandappliance.com or www.allproapplianceandtvrepair.com
